mapper.select: SELECT ID, name FROM ( SELECT ID, ENABLED, NAME FROM STUDENT UNION SELECT ID,ENABLED, cen_name AS name FROM CENTER c UNION SELECT ID,ENABLED, TRPRCHAP AS name FROM TRAINST_MEMBER tm ) WHERE ENABLED = 'T'

SELECT name FROM ( SELECT ID, ENABLED, NAME FROM STUDENT UNION SELECT ID,ENABLED, cen_name AS name FROM CENTER c UNION SELECT ID,ENABLED, TRPRCHAP AS name FROM TRAINST_MEMBER tm ) WHERE ENABLED = 'T' AND ID= #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHATBOARD(SEQ, CHATMEMBER, CONTENT, RECENTDATE) VALUES(CHATBOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{chatmember}, #{content}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT ss.id, ss.name, ca.CNT FROM CHAT_ALARM ca JOIN ( SELECT s.id, s.name from( SELECT ID, name FROM ( SELECT ID, ENABLED, NAME FROM STUDENT UNION SELECT ID,ENABLED, cen_name AS name FROM CENTER c UNION SELECT ID,ENABLED, TRPRCHAP AS name FROM TRAINST_MEMBER tm ) WHERE ENABLED = 'T' ) s JOIN ( SELECT replace( REPLACE (CHATMEMBER, #{id},''), ',' , '') AS friendid FROM CHATBOARD WHERE SUBSTR(CHATMEMBER, 1, INSTR(CHATMEMBER, ',', 1, 1)-1) = #{id} OR SUBSTR(CHATMEMBER, INSTR(CHATMEMBER, ',', 1, 1)+1) = #{id} )r ON( s.id = r.friendid )) ss ON ca.OTHER = ss.ID
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CHATBOARD c WHERE CHATMEMBER = #{chatmember}
mapper.select: SELECT f.seq, f.ID , f.FRIEND_ID , r.name FROM ( SELECT f.seq, f.id, f.FRIEND_ID FROM FRIENDLIST f WHERE id = #{id}) f JOIN (SELECT ID, name FROM ( SELECT ID, ENABLED, NAME FROM STUDENT UNION SELECT ID,ENABLED, cen_name AS name FROM CENTER c UNION SELECT ID,ENABLED, TRPRCHAP AS name FROM TRAINST_MEMBER tm ) WHERE ENABLED = 'T') r ON r.id = FRIEND_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FRIENDLIST(SEQ, ID, FRIEND_ID) SELECT FRIENDLIST_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{friend_id} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT f.ID, f.FRIEND_ID FROM FRIENDLIST f WHERE f.ID = #{id} AND f.FRIEND_ID=#{friend_id})

INSERT INTO ATTACH_FILE(F_SEQ,B_SEQ,ORIGIN_FNAME,STORED_FNAME,FILE_SIZE, F_REGDATE, F_DELFLAG, OWNER) VALUES(A_FILE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 'C'||#{b_seq},#{origin_fname},#{stored_fname},#{file_size}, sysdate, 'N', #{owner})
mapper.select: SELECT F_SEQ,ORIGIN_FNAME,ROUND(FILE_SIZE/1024,1) AS FILE_SIZE, F_REGDATE, OWNER FROM ATTACH_FILE WHERE B_SEQ = 'C'||#{b_seq} AND F_DELFLAG = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT_ALARM(ID, OTHER, CHATROOM, CNT) VALUES(#{id}, #{other}, #{chatroom}, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE CHAT_ALARM SET CNT = 1 WHERE ID=#{id} AND CHATROOM=#{chatroom}
UPDATE CHAT_ALARM SET CNT = 0 WHERE ID=#{id} AND CHATROOM=#{chatroom}
